overview:
Randy Engler is VP, Business Development for Mojo Motors. Mojo Motors is restructuring the used car market by giving consumers more power and control in the buying relationship with dealers.

Randyâ€™s internet experience spans over a decade having joined as an early employee of Half.com (acquired by eBay in June of 2000). Randy led Half.comâ€™s business development and account acquisition teams which were responsible for growing, and managing retail supply across all categories.

Randy spent the next 6 years at eBay in senior management roles leading inventory acquisition and supply efforts in eBayâ€™s media categories with his subsequent role in eBay’s Motors division involved building out and managing key dealer supply relationships, and third party software integration efforts.

Following eBay, Randy spent 4 years as a marketing and strategy consultant and advisor to various early-stage internet start-ups in the Bay Area. Most recently Randy co-founded Zatista, the premier marketplace for original art online.
